text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus is not spreading through border migration you rat turd. There are filth like you and your spoiled tribe visiting wild areas hunting rare animals, eating bush meals & having sex with beasts who are spreading diseases. #TrumpThat #scumbag #racist
